LanguageData.FertilizerCorpse.label: cremate into fertilizer
LanguageData.FertilizerCorpse.description: Cremate a corpse into fertilizer. Be default everything is set to off.
LanguageData.FertilizerCorpseCampfire.label: cremate into fertilizer
LanguageData.FertilizerCorpseCampfire.description: Cremate a corpse into fertilizer at a campfire. Much less effective then the Crematorium. And less efficient. Be default everything is set to off.
